entity_name: MANUAL REACTOR TRIP ON LOSS OF FEEDWATER

entity_value: out of service for water box cleaning
insufficient to satisfy feedwater pump net positive suction
The event has been reviewed with operators to reconfirm that action must be taken quickly when overboarding of condensate occurs
SCE's program to minimize condenser seawater in-leakage will continue
The FFCPD has been returned to service which will preclude the need for overboarding condensate when small condenser tube leaks occur
